com.simsilica.lemur.event

Class ModifiedKeyInputEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.input.event.InputEvent
      • com.jme3.input.event.KeyInputEvent
        • com.simsilica.lemur.event.ModifiedKeyInputEvent

  • public class ModifiedKeyInputEvent
extends com.jme3.input.event.KeyInputEvent
    Extends the regular JME KeyInputEvent to support modifiers like shift, control, and alt.
